channel.title: Force add friend on first login?
channel.description: Well, it's basic (i'd assume) I want all new accounts to have me and my co-owner on their friends list. Think of it as a way to make all users know when we're online off the bat. I wouldn't know where to start with this. Would I have it add my name, or the unique player id it generates?

item.title: Force add friend on first login?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“CoderOops, post:4, topic:482141”]I mean: You can manipulate their account folder, what do they start with (Just like starter items)
Basicly it goes like this:
You give them blank paper with few lines, and they have to fill lines, but you can add lines where ever you want to. (get it?)[/quote]
…
I know it’s possible to add it…
I just don’t know where to start. I would add it to the starter section, obviously.
But what do I add. My player name, or my unique account ID. (This is found when someone adds you, it would be in their player file under friends).

Read full topic
item.source: Force add friend on first login?

item.title: Force add friend on first login?
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

I mean: You can manipulate their account folder, what do they start with (Just like starter items)
Basicly it goes like this:
You give them blank paper with few lines, and they have to fill lines, but you can add lines where ever you want to. (get it?)

Read full topic

item.title: Force add friend on first login?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

CoderOops:

I think you should modify, how people do start their game.

Huh?
They login, have a login message, and that’s it.
There’s no welcome screen or any of that.

Read full topic
